# vchartr

> R Htmlwidget for [VChart](https://github.com/VisActor/VChart) : VChart
> is a charting component library in VisActor visualization system. See
> the [online documentation](https://www.visactor.io/vchart) for
> examples.

## Installation

Install from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=vchartr) with:

``` r
install.packages("vchartr")
```

You can install the development version of vchartr from
[GitHub](https://github.com/dreamRs/vchartr) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("dreamRs/vchartr")
```

## Examples

A scatter plot with
[palmerpenguins](https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/) dataset
and inspired from the documentation:

![](reference/figures/scatterplot.png)

``` r
library(vchartr)
library(palmerpenguins)
vchart(penguins) %>% 
  v_scatter(
    aes(
      x = bill_length_mm,
      y = bill_depth_mm,
      color = species, 
      shape = species
    )
  ) %>%
  v_smooth(
    aes(
      x = bill_length_mm,
      y = bill_depth_mm,
      color = species
    ),
    method = "lm",
    se = FALSE
  ) %>% 
  v_scale_x_continuous(
    name = "Bill length (mm)"
  ) %>% 
  v_scale_y_continuous(
    name = "Bill depth (mm)"
  ) %>% 
  v_labs(
    title = "Penguin bill dimensions",
    subtitle = "Bill length and depth for Adelie, Chinstrap and Gentoo Penguins at Palmer Station LTER"
  ) %>% 
  v_specs_legend(
    orient = "top",
    position = "start",
    layout = "vertical",
    layoutType = "absolute",
    right = 0,
    bottom = 40,
    title = list(
      visible = TRUE,
      text = "Penguin species"
    )
  )
```

A line chart with area range:

![](reference/figures/line.png)

``` r
vchart(temperatures, aes(date)) %>% 
  v_area(
    aes(ymin = low, ymax = high),
    area = list(style = list(fill = "#848585", fillOpacity = 0.3)),
    name = "Low/high between 2019 and 2023"
  ) %>% 
  v_line(
    aes(y = `2024`), 
    line = list(style = list(stroke = "firebrick")),
  ) %>%
  v_scale_x_date(
    date_breaks = "2 months", 
    date_labels = "MMMM",
    date_labels_tooltip = "DD MMMM"
  ) %>% 
  v_scale_y_continuous(
    name = "Temperature in degree celsius",
    labels = format_num_d3(".0f", suffix = "°C"),
    labels_tooltip = format_num_d3(".3r", suffix = "°C")
  ) %>% 
  v_labs(
    title = "Temperatures in France in 2024 compared with previous years",
    subtitle = "Source: Enedis"
  ) %>% 
  v_specs_legend(
    visible = TRUE,
    orient = "top",
    position = "left"
  )
```

## Development

This package use [{packer}](https://github.com/JohnCoene/packer) to
manage JavaScript assets, see packer’s
[documentation](https://packer.john-coene.com/#/) for more.

Install nodes modules with:

``` r
packer::npm_install()
```

Modify `srcjs/widgets/vchart.js`, then run:

``` r
packer::bundle()
```

Re-install R package and try
[`vchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchart.md)
function.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`co2_emissions`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/co2_emissions.md)
  : CO2 emissions

- [`co2_world`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/co2_world.md)
  : World CO2 emissions

- [`countries_gdp`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/countries_gdp.md)
  : Countries GDP

- [`eco2mix`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/eco2mix.md) :
  Monthly electricity generation by source in France

- [`eco2mix_long`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/eco2mix_long.md)
  : Monthly electricity generation by source in France (long format)

- [`electricity_mix`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/electricity_mix.md)
  : Electricity mix for 10 countries

- [`energy_sankey`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/energy_sankey.md)
  : Data for Sankey Chart

- [`format_date_dayjs()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/format-date.md)
  [`format_datetime_dayjs()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/format-date.md)
  [`label_format_date()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/format-date.md)
  [`label_format_datetime()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/format-date.md)
  : Format date with dayjs JavaScript library

- [`format_num_d3()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/format_num_d3.md)
  : Format numbers with D3

- [`v_mark_rect()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/mark-area.md)
  [`v_mark_polygon()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/mark-area.md)
  : Add a rectangle annotation to a chart

- [`v_mark_vline()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/mark-line.md)
  [`v_mark_hline()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/mark-line.md)
  [`v_mark_segment()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/mark-line.md)
  : Add an horizontal or vertical line to a chart

- [`meteo_paris`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/meteo_paris.md)
  : Paris climate

- [`v_scale_color_manual()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-color-manual.md)
  [`v_scale_fill_manual()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-color-manual.md)
  [`v_scale_color_discrete()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-color-manual.md)
  [`v_scale_fill_discrete()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-color-manual.md)
  : Manual color scale

- [`v_scale_x_continuous()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-continuous.md)
  [`v_scale_y_continuous()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-continuous.md)
  [`v_scale_x_log()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-continuous.md)
  [`v_scale_y_log()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-continuous.md)
  : Axis scale for continuous data

- [`v_scale_x_date()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-date.md)
  [`v_scale_y_date()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-date.md)
  [`v_scale_x_datetime()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-date.md)
  [`v_scale_y_datetime()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-date.md)
  : Axis scale for date/time data

- [`v_scale_x_discrete()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-discrete.md)
  [`v_scale_y_discrete()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-discrete.md)
  : Axis scale for discrete data

- [`v_scale_colour_gradient()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-gradient.md)
  [`v_scale_fill_gradient()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/scale-gradient.md)
  : Color scale for continuous data

- [`temperatures`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/temperatures.md)
  : Temperature data

- [`top_cran_downloads`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/top_cran_downloads.md)
  : Top CRAN downloads

- [`top_generation`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/top_generation.md)
  : Top electricity-generating countries

- [`v_area()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_area.md) :
  Create an Area Chart

- [`v_bar()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_bar.md) :
  Create a Bar Chart

- [`v_boxplot()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_boxplot.md)
  : Create a BoxPlot

- [`v_circlepacking()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_circlepacking.md)
  : Create a Circle Packing Chart

- [`v_event()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_event.md)
  : VChart events

- [`v_facet_wrap()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_facet_wrap.md)
  : Facets for vchart

- [`v_gauge()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_gauge.md)
  : Create a Gauge Chart

- [`v_heatmap()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_heatmap.md)
  : Create a Heatmap Chart

- [`v_hist()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_hist.md) :
  Create an Histogram

- [`v_jitter()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_jitter.md)
  : Create Jittered Points Scatter Chart

- [`v_labs()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_labs.md) :
  Set chart title and subtitle

- [`v_line()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_line.md) :
  Create a Line Chart

- [`v_pie()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_pie.md) :
  Create a Pie Chart

- [`v_progress()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_progress.md)
  : Create a Progress Chart

- [`v_radar()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_radar.md)
  : Create a Radar Chart

- [`v_sankey()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_sankey.md)
  : Create a Sankey Chart

- [`v_scale_size()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_scale_size.md)
  : Size scale for continuous data

- [`v_scatter()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_scatter.md)
  : Create a Scatter Chart

- [`v_smooth()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_smooth.md)
  : Create an Smooth Line Chart

- [`v_specs()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs.md)
  :

  Specify configuration options for a
  [`vchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchart.md).

- [`v_specs_axes()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_axes.md)
  : Axes configuration

- [`v_specs_colors()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_colors.md)
  : Set color(s) for chart

- [`v_specs_crosshair()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_crosshair.md)
  : Add crosshair to chart

- [`v_specs_custom_mark()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_custom_mark.md)
  : Add custom mark to chart

- [`v_specs_datazoom()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_datazoom.md)
  : Add data zoom to a chart

- [`v_specs_indicator()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_indicator.md)
  : Add indicator to chart

- [`v_specs_legend()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_legend.md)
  : Set legend options

- [`v_specs_player()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_player.md)
  : Set player options

- [`v_specs_tooltip()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_specs_tooltip.md)
  : Set tooltip options

- [`v_sunburst()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_sunburst.md)
  : Create a Sunburst Chart

- [`v_theme()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_theme.md)
  : Theme for Charts

- [`v_treemap()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_treemap.md)
  : Create a Treemap Chart

- [`v_venn()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_venn.md) :
  Create a Venn Diagram

- [`v_waterfall()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_waterfall.md)
  : Create a Waterfall Chart

- [`v_wordcloud()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/v_wordcloud.md)
  : Create a Wordcloud

- [`vchartOutput()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchart-shiny.md)
  [`renderVchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchart-shiny.md)
  : Shiny bindings for vchart

- [`vchart()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchart.md) :
  Create interactive charts with VChart

- [`vchartr`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchartr-package.md)
  [`vchartr-package`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vchartr-package.md)
  :

  An `htmlwidget` interface to the VChart javascript chart library

- [`vmap()`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/vmap.md) :
  Create a Map

- [`world_electricity`](https://dreamrs.github.io/vchartr/reference/world_electricity.md)
  : World low carbon & fossil electricity generation 2014 - 2023
